[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Project-14.jpg” title_text=”EWL-Project-14″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Bang Na – Pa Kret Expressway

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Thailand; Dual 3 lane Design and Build Expressway; German; $80m; Design of first rigid pavement in Thailand.

[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Project-11.jpg” title_text=”EWL-Project-11″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

M1 Motorway Islamabad – Peshawar

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Pakistan; 125km dual 2 and 3 lane motorway with 3 major river crossings; Turkey – Eximbank; $600m; Concept design and engineering design checks.  Buildability assessment. Pavement design and materials engineering. Quarrying consultancy and advice for production and laying plant.

title.rendered: Istanbul Peripheral Motorway and Second Bosphorus Bridge

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Project-10.jpg” title_text=”EWL-Project-10″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Istanbul Peripheral Motorway and Second Bosphorus Bridge

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Turkey; Dual 3 and 4 lane motorway.  Fatih Sultan Mehmet Suspension Bridge (1.1km), 10 major viaducts and many 1 – 6 span bridges; Italian and Japanese soft loans; $400m; Construction Supervision – materials and pavement engineering, production and placing/laying of construction materials.
